channel.title: Comments on: A Brutally Honest Review Of The MTN HyNetflex Router
channel.description: Web Ã— Design; Branditechture is an hybrid creative design agency.

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/mtn-hynetflex-honest-review/#comment-1706">charles</a>.
No, you don't have to. The two bands would be broadcasted (Except you disable one) and it would look like you have two wifi routers when you scan it on your devices.
You can always connect to which one of the two you want to use.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to charles.

No, you don’t have to. The two bands would be broadcasted (Except you disable one) and it would look like you have two wifi routers when you scan it on your devices.

You can always connect to which one of the two you want to use.

item.title: By: charles
item.dc:creator: charles
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/mtn-hynetflex-honest-review/#comment-1080">Yusuf Odukoya</a>.
so if it has both 2.5ghz and 5ghz how can we access both of them or do i buy the one with 2.5ghz separately?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Yusuf Odukoya.

so if it has both 2.5ghz and 5ghz how can we access both of them or do i buy the one with 2.5ghz separately?

item.title: By: charles
item.dc:creator: charles
item.description: Hi boss my mtn hynetflex range is so poor i literally need to be so close to it before it can see the wifi or connect to the wifi how can i tackle this problem
item.content:encoded: Hi boss my mtn hynetflex range is so poor i literally need to be so close to it before it can see the wifi or connect to the wifi how can i tackle this problem

item.title: By: Mike

item.description: i got this but after the welcome bonus expired I haven't gotten any 100% data bonus to my subscriptions. Is there something I'm doing wrong

item.title: By: Maryam
item.dc:creator: Maryam
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/mtn-hynetflex-honest-review/#comment-1433">Yusuf Odukoya</a>.
Alright boss thank you. But between the 5Ghz and the LAN cable mode, which one is best for online gaming and heavy downloads?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Yusuf Odukoya.

Alright boss thank you. But between the 5Ghz and the LAN cable mode, which one is best for online gaming and heavy downloads?
